basics.name: Jiankun (David) Wei
basics.summary: Dynamic, self-motivated professional with a robust foundation in Computer Science, complemented by a keen interest in Artificial Intelligence and Large Language Models. Boasts a track record of academic excellence, underscored by high university grades and a portfolio of diverse projects. Brings practical experience in software testing, including developing comprehensive test cases. Distinguished by exceptional communication abilities and a collaborative spirit. Eager to deepen expertise in AI through graduate studies, aiming to explore a broad spectrum of models and their applications.

work.name: MEDCVR Lab, University of Toronto
work.summary: Led Large Language Model (LLM) integration for robotics in Unity with C#, enhancing performance and adoption, and established Google Vertex AI connectivity, with regular progress presentations.

work.name: AIT Lab, ETH Zürich
work.summary: Skilled in Detectron2 and FasterRCNN for object detection, adept in source code analysis and GPU resource management, I'm a self-motivated team player focused on collective goals and optimal performance.

work.name: Uken Games Inc.
work.summary: Expert in developing and reviewing test cases, streamlining software testing in Unity with automation, and leveraging tools for enhanced testing communication and efficiency.

highlights: Audited CSC2221: Theory of Distributed Computing
Attend TCURC (Trinity COllege Undergraduate Research Conference

projects.name: LLM-Enhanced Robotics Manipulation
projects.summary: Enhanced robotics control with LLMs for image analysis and real-time response, advanced LLM-driven teleoperation for precision and fault tolerance, and integrated LLMs for smarter robotic autonomy.

projects.name: Crypto Care
projects.summary: Spearheaded database architecture for CryptoCare, handling user registration, login, and real-time balance updates, while also documenting donation activities. Led UI design for the login page, wallet interface, and dashboard's donation sections. Collaborated on integrating MetaMask Ethereum transactions with balance monitoring on the Sepolia testnet. Quickly mastered JavaScript and React, delivering a sophisticated application in a 30-hour sprint with limited prior experience.

projects.name: Multi-Style Transfer
projects.summary: Implemented artistic style transfer on photos using CycleGAN and NST, analyzed their stylistic effects and performance, and demonstrated expertise in PyTorch, TensorFlow, and CycleGAN architecture.

projects.name: Online Learning Community Software
projects.summary: Developed an educational platform with a focus on community and sharing, ensuring quality and reliability through test-driven development, design patterns, and thorough unit testing, managed with version control for collaborative progress.
